attributes.action: Not allow MPs who are law professionals to have anything at all to do with proposed legislation..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This should also be extended to include spouses of all MPs. The fact that the spouse of one of our most prominent MPs is also a leading lawyer dealing with 'Human Rights' should have disbarred the said prominent MP from introducing European Human Rights Law into English Law.
